comments.body:
Naive question since this appears to be code new to this PR and the PR is related to TEntryList.
Is this code path intended to support TEntryList (i.e. only process the entries in the entry list)?

It is supposed to support the cases w/ and w/o the entry lust.
And as far as I can see it does.
Why the question?
Because I don't see how it supports the case **with** entryList.  er As far as I remember GetEntry does not handle EntryList.  You may have meant GetEntryNumber.  See TTreePlayer's usage.

Well, enl is an entry list. The code calls GetEntry either on the TTree or on the associated TEntryList, if defined.
With the TSelector support we have to do like this; as it is done also in proof.

> Well, enl is an entry list.

Sorry, I missed that.  This render my whole point moot of course :)
